text:
Shawn Darnell Fonteno, also known as Solo, is an American actor and rapper. He is best known as the voice and the motion capture performer of Franklin Clinton in the video game "Grand Theft Auto V" (2013). He is also the cousin of rapper Young Maylay who voiced Carl "CJ" Johnson, the protagonist of '.
Fonteno was born in Los Angeles, California, and grew up in neighborhood of Watts.
